effect.sword_shield: Switches the target out for another of its trainer’s Pokémon selected at random. Wild battles end immediately. Doesn’t affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.
effect.the_isle_of_armor: Switches the target out for another of its trainer’s Pokémon selected at random. Wild battles end immediately. Doesn’t affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.
effect.the_crown_tundra: Switches the target out for another of its trainer’s Pokémon selected at random. Wild battles end immediately. Doesn’t affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.
effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Switches the target out for another of its trainer’s Pokémon selected at random. Wild battles end immediately. Doesn’t affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.
effect.legends_arceus: Switches the target out for another of its trainer’s Pokémon selected at random. Wild battles end immediately. Doesn’t affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.

short_effect.sword_shield: Immediately ends wild battles. Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.
short_effect.the_isle_of_armor: Immediately ends wild battles. Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.
short_effect.the_crown_tundra: Immediately ends wild battles. Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.
short_effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Immediately ends wild battles. Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.
short_effect.legends_arceus: Immediately ends wild battles. Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The target is blown away, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The target is blown away, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.
